meanings.definition: Relating to the period following the end of apartheid in South Africa.
meanings.sent1: The postapartheid government focused on building a more inclusive society.
meanings.sent2: Many artists in South Africa today reflect the postapartheid reality in their work.
meanings.sent3: After the postapartheid changes, everyone could finally vote together.
meanings.sent4: The postapartheid era brought a new dawn of unity and equality.
meanings.sent5: The postapartheid landscape was painted with colors of hope and progress.

meanings.definition: Characteristic of the social, political, and economic changes in South Africa after the apartheid era.
meanings.sent1: The postapartheid policies aimed to address the injustices of the past.
meanings.sent2: Businesses adapted to the postapartheid market demands.
meanings.sent3: The postapartheid atmosphere was filled with optimism and resilience.
meanings.sent4: In the postapartheid society, diversity was celebrated as a strength.
meanings.sent5: The postapartheid transformation paved the way for a brighter future for all.
